name: Lost Post
description:
After a tree destroyed your delivery van, your goal is to deliver post to a little suburban area by hand. However, the environment can be hostile and will make you search your keyboard for the lost controls.

You start with WASD controls, but as unfortunate events happen, you have to find new keys for completing your goal.

Global Game Jam 2021 submission.

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lost-post-7

Credits:
Art - Deividas Kryževičius, Minvydas Norkūnas
Programming - Kęstutis Ramulionis, Dalius Gražinskis
Music - Martynas Andruška
